skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: Building user-friendly and responsive web interfaces using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure a smooth and engaging user experience.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Developing robust server-side applications with Node.js, Express, and integrating databases like MongoDB, MySQL, and SQL to power dynamic web applications.

skills.title: Python Development
skills.description: Utilizing Python for backend development, automation tasks, and building scalable, intelligent systems for real-world applications.

skills.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
skills.description: Implementing and optimizing DSA concepts to solve complex problems with efficient and scalable solutions, both for academics and practical use cases.

skills.title: C++ Programming
skills.description: Writing high-performance applications using C++, with a focus on strong object-oriented programming principles and efficient algorithm design.

skills.title: Version Control (Git & GitHub)
skills.description: Working with Git for version control and utilizing GitHub to manage projects, collaborate with teammates, and maintain code integrity.

skills.title: Docker & Containerization
skills.description: Using Docker to create isolated environments for development and deployment, ensuring consistency across different stages of the project lifecycle.

portfolio.title: SmartCall
portfolio.description: SmartCall is a real-time video conferencing app that allows users to create/join calls, share screens, and collaborate seamlessly. Built with React, Node.js, and WebRTC, this project showcases my ability to implement real-time communication features with scheduling and notifications.

portfolio.title: AI-Dashboard
portfolio.description: AI-Dashboard is a clean and responsive dashboard built using React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS. It's fast, minimal, and ready to be supercharged with AI features, showcasing my front-end development skills and ability to build scalable applications.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: This is my personal portfolio where I showcase my skills, projects, and experiences. It's built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, providing a responsive and minimalistic design for visitors to explore my work.
